## bind_choropleth_map_data

## Description
 Bind choropleth data for Flourish maps 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_choropleth_map_data( 
  ., 
  choropleth_data = NULL, 
  choropleth_geometry = NULL, 
  choropleth_name = NULL, 
  choropleth_color_value = NULL, 
  choropleth_group_highlight = NULL, 
  choropleth_add_to_popup_panel = NULL, 
  points_data = NULL, 
  points_name = NULL, 
  points_longitude = NULL, 
  points_latitude = NULL, 
  points_color = NULL, 
  points_size = NULL, 
  points_add_to_popup_panel = NULL, 
  lines_data = NULL, 
  lines_geometry = NULL, 
  lines_group_value = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| choropleth_data | An simple features (`sf`) dataframe. |
| choropleth_geometry | A geometry column in an `sf` dataset |
| choropleth_name | A name column, e.g. city or state. |
| choropleth_color_value | Numeric value for choropleth color |
| choropleth_group_highlight | Draw borders around groups of regions, e.. state borders around counties. May produce odd results if the points of regions with shared boundaries do not match precisely. |
| choropleth_add_to_popup_panel | Add columns to choropleth popup or panel. |
| points_data | Points data frame. |
| points_name | Name |
| points_longitude | Points longitude (X axis) |
| points_latitude | Points latitude (Y axis) |
| points_color | Color of points |
| points_size | Size of points |
| points_add_to_popup_panel | Add a vector of columns to point popups or panels |
| lines_data | A simple features (`sf`) dataframe |
| lines_geometry | A geometry column in an `sf` dataset |
| lines_group_value | Values in the selected column can be used to define specific color and line styles in the settings panel. |
